Change Log

History

2 Mar 07
  - Refactor Sedona source layout and compiler front end
4 Mar 07
  - IR model and IrReader/IrWriter
5 Mar 07
  - Stub VM and main C code
6 Mar 07
 - SCode generation
 - Int math operations
8 Mar 07
  - Assert VM callbacks
  - Int comparison/bitwise operations
  - AST and IR unified namespace
  - Type resolution (kit internal)
  - Param and local variables
  - Assignment statements
9 Mar 07
  - Branching, if/else statements
10 Mar 07
  - Int prefix/postfix increment and decrement
  - While/for loop statements
  - Conditional and/or expressions with if stmt optimization
  - CheckErrors step
11 Mar 07
  - Ternary operator
  - Leave, pop, and stack balancing
  - Float operations
12 Mar 07
  - Float/int cast conversion
  - Static fields
  - Static initializers for field init
14 Mar 07
  - Inline field layout
  - Instance fields
  - Arrays of primitives
15 Mar 07
  - Variable sized references (pointers)
16 Mar 07
  - Translations to Java and C
  - Performance benchmarks
21 Mar 07
  - Instance methods
  - Object arrays and {...} array initialization
  - Instance initializers
  - Foreach statement and opcode
22 Mar 07
  - Field, array increment, decrement, leaves
28 Mar 07
  - Inheritance support
  - Inherited field layout
  - Abstract, virtual, and override methods support
  - Virtual method dispatch
  - Component and Type (for vtables)
29 Mar 07
  - Native methods
  - Primitives and native method doc chapters
30 Mar 07
  - Time API and time literals
  - Support for multiple kits
  - Break tests out into sysTest kit
31 Mar 07
  - Public, protected, private, internal scoping
2 Apr 07
  - VM staging
3 Apr 07
  - This and super keywords (super non-virtual calls)
  - Instance and static access error checking
  - Time.mult, div, hiInt, and loInt
  - Sys natives for formating strings
  - OutStream and Sys.out
4 Apr 07
  - Non-standard string formatting
  - Define fields
24 Apr 07
  - Str class wrapper for byte[]
  - Type literal syntax
  - Const keyword for reflective meta-data
  - Rework virtual table into sys::Virtual base class
  - Added OutStream.flush
  - Const instances and arrays embedded in scode
  - Kit and type meta-data APIs
26 Apr 07
  - Const static fields and Sys.kits
  - Primitive type reflection and type literals
  - Slot reflection and APIs
  - Native methods take SedonaVM parameter
  - Reflective getter and setters
27 Apr 07
  - Rework VM to enable calling a Sedona method from C
  - Reflective invokes
  - Foreach with count expression
  - Slot runtime flags using {config} syntax
  - Port control block library from old Sedona
30 Apr 07
  - Time compare, nsInt, nsFloat, msInt, and msFloat APIs
8 May 07
  - Sys.sleep native call
  - Inet kit: IpAddr, TcpSocket, UdpSocket
9 May 07
  - Refactor Java code into two jars: sedona, sedonac
10 May 07
  - Kit manifest using oBIX
16 May 07
  - New kit manifest API and XML format
  - Kit checksum
17 May 07
  - Manifest database
  - Schema API
22 May 07
  - Array type local variable declarations fixed
  - New natives: Time.setInt, Sys.malloc, Sys.free
  - New Type slots: base, sizeof, is(), malloc()
  - App database: add and remove
23 May 07
  - Doc compiler pipeline
24 May 07
  - Final keyword for classes
  - Constructors
  - Support for ctor sizing of inline arrays
29 May 07
  - Fix checking for duplicate locals in scope
  - Fix constructor statement ordering
  - Array pointer arithmetic
  - Buf API
  - App save/load
  - New doc chapters: architecture
30 May 07
  - Rework qname meta-data to use less memory
  - Automate the test case harness
  - New doc chapters: testing, porting
1 Jun 07
  - Refactor Java Buf API
4 Jun 07
  - Add property default values to manifests
  - Component model APIs for Java toolkit
5 Jun 07
  - Java support for app XML and binary encoding/decoding
  - Change OutStream write APIs to return bool
  - File API
6 Jun 07
  - Sedona main and now requires Str[] arguments
  - New standard Sys.main() entry point
  - App load from file
  - Remove offset from socket APIs
  - WebService up and running again
7 Jun 07
  - WebRes buffered output
  - Linking
  - Port SoxService, UdpSoxService
  - Stub API doc compiler
19 Jun 07
  - SoxClient, connection setup and teardown
21 Jun 07
  - Refactor into OfflineComponent and SoxComponent
  - Refactor link storage to use to/from comp linked lists
  - Added Component.pos property
26 Jun 07
  - Redesign subscription/event engine using Watches
  - Redesign sox protocol to be stateless
27 Jun 07
  - Short circuit reflection setters if no value change
  - Normalize property sets into Component.setx() calls
  - Slot literals: TypeName.slotName
  - Sizeof literals: TypeName.sizeof
28 Jun 07
  - Redesign SoxClient load, read, sub/unsub
2 Jul 07

5 Jul 07

  - Facets support
9 Jul 07
  - Sox error responses
10 Jul 07
  - Assignment operators +=, -=, *=, /=, etc
12 Jul 07

  - More robust event queuing, firing, and retries

24 Jul 07
  - Symbolic array lengths using define
  - Symbolic ctor length argument using define
31 Jul 07
  - Switch statement
  - Fix local variable not in scope used
20 Aug 07

  - Collapse inet::UdpSocketService into SoxServer (reverse depends)
11 Sep 07

25 Sep 07

4 Oct 07

Nov 07
  - 64-bit long/double support
Build 1.0.1 (17 Dec 07)
  - Reorg source tree
  - Kit database of multiple versions
  - Platform database for provisioning
  - Python build scripts
Build 1.0.2 (10 Jan 08)
  - Buf literals
  - Rework IpAddr for IPv6
  - Labelled goto statements
Build 1.0.3 (16 Jan 08)
  - Bug fixes
Build 1.0.4 (16 Jan 08)
  - Fix checksums
Build 1.0.5 (17 Jan 08)
  - Set SoxClient tuning options from sedona.properties
  - Fix deadlock on timeouts
  - Add jenStuff kit for demos
Build 1.0.6 (12 Feb 08)
  - Portal build support
Build 1.0.7 (5 Mar 08)
  - Replace nullbool, nullfloat keywords with just null
  - Support for null doubles
  - Redesign of provisioning tools
Build 1.0.8 (11 Mar 08)
  - Added Sys.rand
  - Added inet::Crypt
  - Added LoadNullDouble opcode
  - Added File.rename
  - Provisioning tool works for Win32/QNX
Build 1.0.9 (18 Mar 08)
  - Provisioning tool enhancements
Build 1.0.10 (25 Mar 08)
  - Fixes
Build 1.0.11 (16 Apr 08)
  - Rework Sox to use Dasp
  - Unified 6LoWPAN coordinator software
Build 1.0.12 (22 Apr 08)
  - Coordinator uses IP mapping table
  - SedonaNetwork fixes
Build 1.0.13 (23 Apr 08)
  - Workbench Jennic Service
  - SoxSession spy page
Build 1.0.14 (24 Apr 08)
  - Tweaks to jenStuff
  - SedonaDevice spy for dasp diagnostics
Build 1.0.15 (29 Apr 08)
  - Fix send window ackMore overrun bug
  - Fix jennic circuluar queue bug
  - Fix double session bug when challenge dropped
  - Fix various SedonaNetwork bugs
Build 1.0.16 (29 Apr 08)
  - Minor fix to send window
Build 1.0.17 (27 May 08)
  - Reorder sox support
  - Execution order is based on tree order
  - Sys.compareBytes native method
  - Sox authentication
  - Limit children under one component to 200
  - Depend version and checksum matched with logical and
  - ConstFolding compiler step
  - Peephole IR optimizations
  - EqZero and NotEqZero opcodes
  - New JumpIntXxx opcodes
  - New combination opcodes
  - Optimize space for long, float, double literals
  - Unaligned arguments for call opcodes
  - VM and scode version rolled to 1.4
  - Scode image flags for test/debug (versionMore)
Build 1.0.18 (11 Jun 08)
  - Fix delete bug when component has circular link
  - Computed goto vm optimization
  - Doc chapters: Expr, Stmt, Fields, Methods
Build 1.0.19 (17 Jun 08)
  - Security model and permission checking
Build 1.0.20 (25 Jun 08)
Build 1.0.21 (25 Jun 08)
  - Reorganize code for open source
Build 1.0.22 (26 Jun 08)
  - Cleanup doc and src for full build
Build 1.0.23 (9 Jul 08)
  - More code reorg for Jennic ROM
Build 1.0.24 (30 Jul 08)
  - Null safe navigation ?. operator
  - Elvis ?: operator
  - Rename runVM => vmRun
  - Abstract call() as function pointer
  - Platform manifest nativePatch
  - New doc chapters: networking, dasp, sox
Build 1.0.25 (21 Aug 08)
  - Added dasp connectTimeout option (defaults to 10sec)
  - Hibernate APIs
  - Workbench convert to Sax/Sab on SaxFile/SabFile
  - Workbench SlotSheet
Build 1.0.26 (3 Sep 08)
  - New docs: introduction, architecture, licensing
  - Fix bug related to dasp sending window size
Build 1.0.27 (17 Sep 08)
  - Stop and free mememory on app exit
  - Fix bugs and optimize dasp tuning
Build 1.0.28 (2 Dec 08)
  - Sedonac generates Java bytecode
  - Sedona Java runtime (jsvm.exe)
  - Remove ability to perform pointer arithmetic
  - Change array based APIs to pass offset
  - Str.set -> copyFromStr
  - Buf.getStr -> toStr
  - Buf.setStr -> copyFromStr
  - Buf.set -> copyFromBuf
  - Str.buf made private (use get/set/toBytes)
  - Cast type checking
  - Heap new/delete operators
  - Limit dasp max receive window to 31 to fit within 32-bit int
Build 1.0.29 (16 Dec 08)
  - Fix JVM SedonaClassLoader to use match correct kit by checksum
  - Optimize Str.get/set into byte[] array load/store instructions
  - App.initApp now takes initial comps array size
  - Linux tooling and SVM support
  - Optimize Sedona reflection on JVM
Build 1.0.30
  - Updated documentation
  - Kit names must now be prefixed with vendor name
  - Vendor names restricted to less than 32 alphanum chars
  - Add support for maxStack to Java bytecode
  - Map Sedona slot facets thru to Niagara slot facets
Build 1.0.31
  - Update build scripts
Build 1.0.32
  - Updated documentation
  - Fix auto-close when issuing commands that shutdown the VM
  - Add Sys maxInt, minInt, maxLong, minLong
  - Support for Str defines
  - Array literal defines (byte, short, int, long, float, double, Str)
Build 1.0.33 (24 Feb 09)
  - Updated documentation
  - Add exact version match to Depend grammar. ("foo 1.0.10=")
  - Check that continue/break are inside of loop
Build 1.0.34 (05 Mar 09)
  - Sox queryService message type
Build 1.0.35 (27 Mar 09)
  - Rename Platform to PlatformService
  - Move Sys.platform to App.platform
  - Require all sab files to declare PlatformService
Build 1.0.36 (22 Apr 09)        
  - Add version information into sedona.jar
  - Support scientific notation
  - All actions are now virtual by definition. (Action overridding)
  - Roll scode version to 1.5 for virtual actions
Build 1.0.37 (14 May 09)
  - Support define exprs as facet values
  - updated docs
  - Enum range facet  
Build 1.0.38 (09 June 09)
  - Units.sedona with defines for standard unit database
  - Rework sys::File API and natives
  - Sox enhancements for file get/put
Build 1.0.40 (24 June 09)
  - New sedonacert Java module   
  - Add Context parameter to all the Java native methods
  - Platform Redesign
Build 1.0.41 (21 July 09)
  - Sox enhancements for Chopan
  - Weblet enhancements
  - Various bug fixes
Build 1.0.42 (skipped)
Build 1.0.43 (30 July 09)
  - Various bug fixes
Build 1.0.44 (next build)
